Posts.Content: I'm a personal trainer of a client that had a modified radical masectomy 6 years ago. We have been working out 3 times a week for 3 weeks now, and today my client told me that she experiances pain when we do any movements were she has to streach her arms at her sides. An example of this is when we do lat pull downs or cable presses, ect. Has anyone else encountered this problem?
Posts.Title: Pain when exercising
